Player History
Traded from New York (N) to Cincinnati on 6/12/1966 (Going to CIN: P J. Miller, P R. Craig. Going to NYM: 2B H. Yamazaki, P D. Sutherland)...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/11/1967 to a 1-year deal worth $600,000 per year...
Drafted in 3rd round, 57th overall pick, by Texas in 1969...
Drafted in 5th round, 90th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1976...
Had first career hit on 9/23/1983, off Danny Boone (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1984, off Cecilio Guante (MIN)...
Released by Chicago (A) on 10/24/1986...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 7/21/1989 to a minor league deal...
